name: Voyage of the Scarab King
description:
PLEASE READ FIRST.

HTML VERSION: There are known bugs. If the background appears to be black or you can't see the images, or the game is laggy, please play the downloadable version instead.
TO SAVE YOUR PROGRESS, PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION.

Khepri, the Scarab God, will be dead by nightfall if the rumours are to be believed. 

As Khepri embarks upon his nightly quest to carry the sun through the Netherworld, the citizens of Lunu are behaving strangely. Demons are stirring and Khepri must find out why...

A party-based RPG made in 30 days for GitHub Game Off (theme: bugs). Inspired by Egyptian mythology.

Made with Godot v3.3.3. Uses the Godot Ink addon for dialogue: https://github.com/paulloz/godot-ink
